prompt.span: Professor Thames tried to use a Guttman scale on his data set that he had seen published in a major journal. Thames was upset because the items did not form a Guttman scale on his data. Confused, he asked for your help. You should tell him that:

simpleChoice.span: the article that appeared in the journal was probably an error.
